title: New: Vondelpark – Interlude
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/vondelparknewvid.jpg "vondelparknewvid")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8282-new-vondelpark-interlude/attachment/vondelparknewvid/)

My [opinions](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/5362-review-vondelpark-sauna) towards **Vondelpark**’s debut EP Sauna were mixed. Regardless of the records lacklustre ending it had a striking sound, that although flawed, oozed with personally and grace. It was heart-felt yet damned by its own insecurities, but ultimately it was remarkably human. **Vondelpark**’s first release from his new EP, _NYC Things And NYC Bags_, is just as delirious and semi-conscious; it manages to be gentle and soothing while perverse and menacing. It also comes with a home video that strikes a balance between ridiculousness and car crash like sorrow. Check it out bellow.

It was heart-felt yet damned by its own insecurities, but ultimately it was remarkably human. Vondelpark’s first release from his new EP, NYC Things And NYC Bags, \[…\]
excerpt.short: My opinions towards Vondelpark’s debut EP Sauna were mixed.
